data.distance: Any one person you can clearly see

criticalFailure.@en: Your legs turn to jelly, as you are knocked Prone and unable to move for the duration.

criticalSuccess.@en: They cannot Resist the first three minutes of duration.

effect.@en: After successfully casting (and one foe cannot or fails to Resist using Toughness), they temporarily reduce their Movement by a cumulative -1 by every minute. They may attempt to Resist every minute, until the duration is up.

reagents.@en: A leg bone, which you break in hand
